items.q: What are the main features of the website?
items.a: Holiday Calendar provides information on all U.S. holidays, including holiday countdowns, origins, guides, celebration suggestions, and taboos.

items.q: How are the holiday countdowns on the homepage organized?
items.a: The homepage displays countdowns for the next three upcoming holidays, helping users quickly see what's coming next.

items.q: How can I view the full list of holidays?
items.a: You can access the complete holiday list from the homepage, where holidays are arranged chronologically. Clicking on any holiday will take you to its detailed page.

items.q: What information is included on the holiday detail pages?
items.a: Each holiday detail page includes a countdown, the holiday's origin, guides, celebration ideas, and relevant taboos.

items.q: Are the sources of holiday information reliable?
items.a: Yes, all holiday information is based on authoritative sources and historical records to ensure accuracy and reliability.

items.q: Does the website include both federal and state holidays?
items.a: Yes, we provide information on federal holidays as well as unique holidays observed in specific states.

items.q: Why are there taboos for some holidays?
items.a: Certain holidays are tied to specific cultural or religious traditions, which may include unique practices and taboos. These are explained in detail on the holiday pages.
Yes, our website is optimized for mobile devices, so you can access it seamlessly from your phone or tablet.

footer.title: Holiday Calendar
footer.description: Your comprehensive guide to American holidays and celebrations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Holiday Calendar is dedicated to enriching people's lives by helping them celebrate and understand holidays better. We strive to provide comprehensive, accurate, and culturally sensitive information about holidays across the United States, making it easier for everyone to participate in and appreciate these special occasions.

features.title: What We Offer
features.item1: Comprehensive holiday listings with accurate dates and countdowns
features.item2: Detailed information about holiday histories, traditions, and customs
features.item4: Regular updates to ensure the most current holiday information

technology.title: Our Technology
technology.content: Built with cutting-edge web technologies including Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, our platform delivers a fast, reliable, and user-friendly experience. We utilize modern internationalization techniques to provide accurate and culturally appropriate content in multiple languages.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.content: We value your feedback and suggestions. Whether you've found an error, have a feature request, or just want to say hello, we'd love to hear from you. You can reach us through our contact page or follow us on social media for updates.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to Holiday Calendar. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we handle your information when you use our website.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect minimal information necessary to provide our services, including: browser type, device information, and cookies for site functionality.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the collected information to provide and improve our services, analyze site usage, and maintain site security.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access or disclosure.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact us if you wish to exercise these rights.

sections.title: Agreement to Terms
sections.content: By accessing Holiday Calendar, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.

sections.title: Use License
sections.content: Permission is granted to temporarily access the materials on Holiday Calendar for personal, non-commercial use only.

sections.title: Disclaimer
sections.content: The materials on Holiday Calendar are provided on an 'as is' basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim all warranties.

sections.title: Limitations
sections.content: Holiday Calendar shall not be held liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use our services.

sections.title: Revisions
sections.content: We may update these terms of service at any time. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the current version.
